stage_identity.evidence: Teen Byte proportions maintained - gangly limbs, longer body form consistent with teen stage anchor. Pixel art silhouette matches expected teen morphology.

pixel_style.evidence: Clean pixel art style preserved with dithered shading, 2D forms, readable silhouette. Color palette matches requested night tones (#1a1a2e, #16213e purple-blues).

requested_changes_visible.evidence: Sleeping pose with closed eyes visible, Z symbols floating above head in scattered formation, night lighting with deep purple-blue ambient glow from Chicago skyline, cozy bed present, desk/laptop tucked away as specified for sleep hours.

artifact_free.evidence: No garbled text, floating glyphs, or malformed anatomy detected. Clean rendering of Byte form, bed structure, and background elements.

prop_layout_integrity.evidence: Single food bowl on floor positioned right of bed. Trophy shelf with exactly one golden 10-day trophy on left side and one green plant on right side - proper spacing maintained, no overlap. Three Z symbols floating in staggered formation above Byte's head. All props properly spaced with no intersection.

anchors_present.evidence: Chicago skyline window visible in background providing night ambient light. Trophy shelf positioned above desk area. Room structure consistent with canonical teen stage layout.

temporal_mood_match.evidence: Night scene with is_sleeping=true reflected - dim purple-blue lighting, closed eyes, peaceful expression, Z symbols present. Time of day transition (evening_to_night) captured with darker tones than previous evening image.

reground_cleanup.evidence: Not applicable - normal mode edit, not re-ground.
